message.en:
This is a message from Demo NGO.

We have received your application for support.

You will receive another message with more information within 1 week.

This is a message from Demo NGO.

There is a message waiting for you. Please reply “yes” to this message to receive it.
Please reply to this message within 24 hours to receive your voucher of [[amount]] units

This is a message from Demo NGO.

With this message you will receive:
1. An Albert Heijn supermarket voucher (cadeaukaart) of [[amount]] units - this is the picture with the barcode.
2. An explanation on how to use the voucher in Albert Heijn.

If you received more than one voucher this is because you had not yet received vouchers from previous weeks.

The value of each voucher is €[[amount]].
You can spend the vouchers at any Albert Heijn supermarket in the Netherlands.

You don’t have to spend everything at once. So keep the vouchers and re-use them until the €[[amount]] on each voucher is finished.

You will receive your €[[amount]] Albert Heijn voucher every week on Tuesday until:
1. You are no longer on the list of our partner organisations.
2. The end of the project (you will be informed two weeks in advance).

Do you have questions? Send us a message on WhatsApp: https://wa.me/31600000000
This is an automated message, for questions please contact the Red Cross Helpdesk
